articles.content: As a two-time Olympic Gold medalist and two-time FIFA World Cup champion, Hamm is undoubtedly one of the most decorated female soccer players of all-time. She also has a golf bag setup that many golf… [+1165 chars]

articles.title: Kingsbury tops first round of moguls qualifying, advances - NBC Olympics
articles.description: Defending Olympic gold medalist Mikael Kingsbury of Canada advanced straight to the finals as the top qualifier, while USA's Cole McDonald and Dylan Walczyk also made it through directly in fifth and 10th, respectively.
